abstractText: A Nepalese composite paper manuscript with the Abhisamayālaṅkāra and the Prajñāpāramitāstotra preceding the Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā. The kernel of the manuscript (ff. 412-559) consists of "paper of the 17th or beginning of the 18th century; the rest is recent supply" (Bendall 1883: 144).
abstractShort: A Nepalese composite paper manuscript with the Abhisamayālaṅkāra and the Prajñāpāramitāstotra preceding the Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā
title: Abhisamayālaṅkāra, Prajñāpāramitāstotra, Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā
